Published January 13 2015

Obama Pushes for Municipal Broadband

Obama Pushes for Municipal Broadband — Having the cable companies compete with local governments is a good thing, at least in the context of broadband. I’d much rather pay $70 for 100 Mbps, instead of the 15 Mbps I get now.

Enjoy your day.
